com.alvermont.terraj.planet.io
Class ImageBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.planet.io.ImageBuilder

public class ImageBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Class to build a BufferedImage from the results of a projection. This allows standard Java image processing facilities to be used to write out and manipulate the results. Reference material used in writing this class came from the book Java 2D Graphics published by O Reilly. http://www.oreillynet.com/cs/catalog/view/au/25?x-t=book.view

Version:
$Id: ImageBuilder.java,v 1.5 2006/07/06 06:59:43 martin Exp $
Author:
martin

Method Detail

getPixels

protected byte[] getPixels(Projector proj)
Get the pixel array that makes up the image

Parameters:
proj - The projection to be converted
Returns:
An array of pixel data top to bottom, left to right, with each pixel being represented by 3 bytes in RGB order

getImage

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(Projector proj)
Create and return a BufferedImage object from the result of the projection. This image can then be further processed or written out to a file using ImageIO.

Parameters:
proj - The projection that will provide the image
Returns:
A BufferedImage object containing the results of the projection.
